entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 18 January 2023
